readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.18/f George 1500/p George: sadpiano/17 17/farmer 10 19 1 George 18 17 0/skippable/emote George 12/speak George "不行……够不到！$u#$b#要是我能从这该死的椅子上站起来……$s"/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/showFrame 15/pause 500/pause 500/playSound Ship/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection George 3/showFrame 35/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 300/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/speak George "谢谢你，年轻人。^谢谢"/pause 800/speed George 1/faceDirection George 2/pause 500/move George 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak George "孩子，那是 30 年前。$s#$b#我当时在煤矿里上班。我们马上就要换班了，但还剩最后一个矿需要炸开。#$b#我拿着一支炸药，要去引爆，但我绊了一下。炸药掉在地上，爆炸了。"/pause 800/speak George "等我再醒过来的时候，就已经躺在医院里了……然后他们告诉我，我再也不能走路了。"/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你明白了吧。你本来以为我是因为太老所以不能走路的吧#$b#如果不是那场意外，现在我的腿脚肯定比年轻还灵活！"/faceDirection George 2/speak George "……"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1700/speak George "你对我很好，年轻人。非常感谢。^你对我真的不错，孩子。我很感激。#$b#等你老了，就会开始忘记，所有人都在关心你。"/pause 800/faceDirection George 3/pause 1000/end
content.19/f Evelyn 1000/p Evelyn: jaunty/3 17/farmer 8 19 3 Evelyn 3 17 0/skippable/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Evelyn 2/speak Evelyn "噢！@!你是不是在想这阵香味儿是从哪儿飘来的啊？#$b#哈哈，你真会说话！我其实正在烤我的招牌饼干！$h"/emote farmer 16/speak Evelyn "给，尝尝味道怎么样？"/faceDirection Evelyn 0/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/faceDirection Evelyn 2/pause 900/farmerEat 223/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Evelyn "$q 51 null#您觉得如何？#$r 51 100 Event_cookies1#很美味！#$r 51 -100 Event_cookies2#就像在嚼冰球"/playMusic none/speak Evelyn "既然我们已经这么熟了，就把我的配方给你吧。但是你要保守秘密。$h"/playSound reward/message "已学会制作“饼干”"/addCookingRecipe Cookies/end
content.21/f Alex 1250/p Alex: sadpiano/12 5/farmer 10 11 0 Alex 13 5 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Alex "*唉*$s"/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -5 1/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 600/speak Alex "哦，嗨，@。$s"/faceDirection Alex 0/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/emote farmer 8/pause 500/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "瞧瞧这些书啊。我一本都没读过。光是想到要把书翻开，就让我紧张得不行。$s#$b#但在这个世上，没有文化，就过不上好日子……$s"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "$q 57 null#我真没用……$s#$r 57 0 Event_books1#才不是。你明明是个天才！#$r 57 50 Event_books2#我们都有自己的长处和短处。#$r 57 -50 Event_books3#没用？对，总结得很精辟。"/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 1000/emote Alex 16/speak Alex "好吧，我不会放弃！$a"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "有志者事竟成！"/jump farmer/pause 800/speak Alex "嘿，说不定我们很快就能一边吃饭一边讨论……则、哲、哲学。你们聪明人经常谈论的就是这个吧？$h"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopAnimation farmer/end
content.2119820/f Alex 1500/p Alex: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 10 10 0 Alex 13 6 2/skippable/showFrame Alex 28/animate Alex false true 100 28 29 30 31 32 32 31 30 29 28/viewport 13 6 true/pause 6500/stopAnimation Alex/pause 1000/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/showFrame Alex 34 true/animate Alex false false 100 28 33 34/pause 600/speak Alex "噢！嘿……我正在进行日常体能锻炼。$6#$b#……抱歉，我没有穿衬衫。$6"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "@？我正想和你说件事儿呢……$8"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Alex "我已经开始意识到……那个，我以前对你太粗鲁了。就是关于去职业队的事情。$8"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 33/pause 1000/speak Alex "我想我其实不是做专业运动员的料……或许那只是我幼稚的幻想……你说呢？$8#$b#话说……我想为我的夸夸其谈和喋喋不休，向你道歉。谢谢你不生我的气，还把我当作朋友。$6"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/showFrame Alex 34/pause 800/emote Alex 32/pause 1200/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/showFrame Alex 28/pause 100/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/animate Alex false true 50 30 31 32 32 31 30/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "好，乔治。我要你深吸一口气。"/pause 700/speak Harvey "嗯……请转过身来。"/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "乔治，我跟你说实话吧。你如果想健康长寿的话，就得改改你的生活方式。#$b#你得减少食盐的摄入量，并且适量锻炼一下你的手臂。"/emote George 12/speak George "嗯……我知道怎么做最好。你以为你是谁啊，敢对我的生活指手画脚？"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你问我是谁……我是你的医生，乔治。#$b#而我学了 8 年医，就是为了帮人们保持健康。"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "噢！#$b#对不起，你不能待在这里……检查时闲人免进。"/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "别着急！我还要再听听这个年轻人的意见。^别着急！我还要再听听这位年轻女士的意见。"/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "那好……"/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@你觉得乔治该怎么做？#$r 84 40 event_george1#乔治应该听从哈维医生的建议。#$r 85 -40 event_george2#乔治知道怎么做对他的身体最好。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "好。我就照你说的做，医生。"/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "$p 84#谢谢你的帮助，@。我很感激。$h|你最好不要误导我的病人，@。请你以后记住这一点。"/end
content.5837189/n georgeGifts: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 George 18 19 2 Evelyn 3 17 0/skippable/animate George false true 400 0 20/positionOffset George 0 -16/specificTemporarySprite 114 241 14 15 16.5 18/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 20 17/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 19 17/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 103 243 10 13 18.5 19.5/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17.25 20.6/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17 21 999 .8/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17.5 21 999 .8/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 103 243 10 13 15 18/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors 288 1231 16 16 17 19 998/viewport 18 19 true/pause 5000/warp farmer 9 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 4 0 1/stopAnimation George/faceDirection George 3/speak George "@？这都是什么意思……#$b#是什么恶作剧吗？"/pause 500/quickQuestion #我们想表达对你的感谢#你的妻子搞出来的#是的，就是恶作剧(break)playMusic none\pause 1000\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\specificTemporarySprite georgeLeekGift\specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 998\playSound Ship\pause 800\showFrame George 21\playSound coin\playMusic echos\pause 1000\speak George "韭葱……$s"\pause 1000\speak George "是我的最爱……就像妈妈在好多年前一直做的一样……"\pause 2000\showFrame George 0\faceDirection George 2\speak George "唔。嗯……"\emote George 40\showFrame George 16\pause 500\speak George "嗯，那个……唔……#$b#我想我大概没有我以为的那样，被遗忘和忽视了……$s"\faceDirection George 3\speak George "谢谢你，儿子。$h^谢谢，亲爱的。$h#$b#我这老头子太高兴了。$h"\pause 500\emote farmer 32(break)playMusic none\pause 300\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "哈！她以为能耍我！"\pause 500\faceDirection George 2\pause 400\showFrame George 16\pause 600\speak George "她以为能耍我……让我以为我只是个麻烦。$s"\stopAnimation George\faceDirection George 3\speak George "呵，我才没那么蠢……"\pause 400\faceDirection George 1\speak George "赶紧滚！$u"\emote farmer 28(break)playMusic none\pause 300\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "哈！所以你就是捣蛋鬼？"\emote George 40\playMusic playful\speak George "哈哈……这样啊，我年轻的时候也经常恶作剧。$h"\faceDirection George 2\speak George "嗯，至少你让我笑了笑。$h"\pause 2000\faceDirection George 3\emote George 8\speak George "什么，你以为我会打开？"\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "哈！不可能。你以为我会中那个老套的“爆炸礼物”的陷阱？"\faceDirection George 2\speak George "我会直接把它们丢进垃圾桶！"\pause 300\faceDirection farmer 2 true\showFrame farmer 94\jump farmer/pause 2000/end
